metadata.title: CVE-2019-3806 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue has been found in PowerDNS Recursor versions after 4.1.3 before4.1.9 where Lua hooks are not properly applied to queries received over TCPin some specific combination of settings, possibly bypassing securitypolicies enforced using Lua.

criterions.comment: pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
